title: How dare Riot make Sona have a reasonable winrate
body:
Riot how dare you make Sona share the same winrate as Karma, and Lulu. I was having too much fun completely suppressing them all season with my 200 IQ risk free poke from behind my minions with 0 counterplay other than "you can't CS haHAA" HOW DARE YOU RITO!!!!

How dare you make me do less damage than my ADC in lane now I actually have to try keeping them alive and working together to win lane RITO WTF IF YOU DON'T REVERT CHANGES I UNINSTALL NAOW!!!

replies.body:
UHH 0 COUNTER PLAY?

WHAT ABOUT ADC'S AUTO???
idk when i play {{champion:238}}  i feel like i have plenty of counterplay against those autos.

> [{quoted}](name=YaRossy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cq2m3m5B,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-12-09T03:42:00.705+0000)
>
> idk when i play {{champion:238}}  i feel like i have plenty of counterplay against those autos.

but {{item:3026}} {{item:2419}}

and Zed is almost always banned so ya.

> [{quoted}](name=YaRossy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cq2m3m5B,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-09T04:34:18.752+0000)
>
> Then i can replace zed with {{champion:142}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:105}} 
> 
> Or any other assassin. lol
> 
> 
> and u only get  the watch once, and if i force u to get a early ga, then you're gonna fall behind regardless.

But assassins can kill any squishy including apc and enchanter support.

> [{quoted}](name=Ahris,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cq2m3m5B,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-09T03:39:48.350+0000)
>
> UHH 0 COUNTER PLAY?
> 
> WHAT ABOUT ADC'S AUTO???

IKR THOSE DAMN ADC HOW DARE THEY DO AS MUCH DAMAGE AS ME
QQ about QQ is still QQ.
